name: Jumping Mellow
description:
Welcome to the dessert world!
A peaceful dessert world where various desserts live together.
But the dangers that emerged one day destroyed the peace of the dessert world. You, who love peace and adventure more than anyone else, are now a tiny soft marshmallow and start your adventure to discover the secrets of the endangered dessert world. Can you overcome the many obstacles that stand in your way and regain the peace of the dessert world?

Game play
- Simple control using arrow keys and jump keys.
- There are many obstacles that threaten you.
- There are items that help you like a shield, boost, etc.
- There are star items you can collect.
- Let's go up faster! (Time ranking system)

Although the control keys are simple, sometimes skilled control will be required. You can use various elements in the game and jump to higher with meticulous control and creative ways.
